1、2019年3月13日，第二届董事会第十二次会议审议通过关于使用部分闲置募集资金暂时补充流动资金的议案。2、2019年4月23日，第二届董事会第十三次会议审议通过关于向招商银行申请综合授信额度的议案。3、2019年4月29日，第二届董事会第十四次会议审议通过公司2018年度董事会工作报告；公司2018年度总经理工作报告；公司2018年年度报告及其摘要；公司2018年度财务决算报告；公司2019年年度财务预算报告；关于公司2018年度利润分配的议案；关于续聘立信会计师事务所（特殊普通合伙）为公司审计机构的议案；关于会计政策变更的议案；2018年度募集资金存放及实际使用情况的专项报告；关于补充确认日常性关联交易并预计2019年度日常性关联交易的议案；关于修订公司章程的议案；关于修订董事会议事规则的议案；关于召开公司2018年年度股东大会的议案；公司2019年度第一季度报告等14项议案。4、2019年7月11日，第二届董事会第十五次会议审议通过关于聘任陈媛媛为公司副总经理的议案。5、2019年8月27日，第二届董事会第十六次会议审议通过2019年半年度报告；2019年半年度募集资金存放及实际使用情况的专项报告；关于会计政策变更的议案等3项议案。6、2019年10月14日，第二届董事会第十七次会议审议通过关于使用部分闲置募集资金暂时补充流动资金的议案；关于聘任伍英瑜为公司副总经理的议案等2项议案。7、2019年10月30日，第二届董事会第十八次会议审议通过2019年第三季度报告。8、2019年12月13日，第二届董事会第十九次会议审议通过关于变更募集资金用途的议案；关于召开2019年第一次临时股东大会的议案等

公司现行的内部管理制度均是依据《公司法》《公司章程》和国家有关法律法规的规定，结合公司自身的实际情况制定的，符合企业规范管理、规范治理的要求，在完整性和合理性方面不存在重大缺陷。 由于内部控制制度是一项长期而持续的系统工程，需要根据公司所处行业、经营现状和发展情况不断调整、完善。关于会计核算体系：报告期内，公司严格贯彻国家法律法规，规范公司会计核算体系，依法开展会计核算工作。关于财务管理体系：报告期内，从会计人员、财务部门、财务管理制度和会计政策四个方面完善和执行公司的财务管理体系。关于风险控制体系：报告期内，公司在有效分析市场风险、政策风险、经营风险、法律风险等的前提下，采取事前防范、事中控制等措施，从企业规范的角度继续完善风险控制体系。报告期内，公司未发现上述管理制度 存在重大缺陷。

Including blank sample determination, drawing and inspection of calibration curve, parallel sample determination, retention sample retest, spiked recovery rate determination, password quality control sample and password spiked sample determination, instrument comparison and method comparison, and personnel comparison.

chinese_cell_value_list: 核心技术人员流失的风险
实际控制人不当控制的风险
重要风险事项简要描述
创新制剂研发从制剂关键工艺技术研究、临床前研究、临床研究到NMPA审批要经历的周期较长,且投入较大,不可预测的因素较多:(1)在研产品仿制药一致性评价能否通过存在一定不确定性,可能导致无法获得NMPA的审批;(2)后续立项产品研发如不能加速推进,容易错过产品最佳上市时间,进而可能影响未来经济效益;(3)研发产品如最终面临失败,则对公司业绩将带来重大影响,从而会影响公司的可持续发展。
公司属于技术密集型企业,研发技术人员的经验和研发能力对研发能否实现具有重要作用。随着行业内竞争日趋激烈,对核心技术人才的争夺也越发白热化。为此公司出台了一系列激励机制,且公司核心技术人员直接或间接持有公司股份,但仍可能出现核心技术人员流失,将会对公司发展带来不利影响。
公司核心技术是公司核心竞争力的重要组成部分,如公司研发成果泄密或受侵害,将会对公司发展带来不利影响。为此公司建立了周全的技术保密制度,加强对核心技术的保护和知识产权管理,并与全体研发人员签订了技术保密协议,但仍无法排除存在核心技术泄密的风险。
截至2019年12月31日，公司实际控制人及其一致行动人陈赟华、陈贇俊、吴健、潘小玲、刘芝佑、陈传庚、蒋朝军、笃圣投资合计持有公司4,336.90万股，占公司股份的52.70%。其中：陈赟华为公司董事长，吴健为董事、董秘，蒋朝军为董事、总经理，陈贇俊、刘芝佑、陈传庚
english_cell_value_list: Risk of loss of core technicians
Risk of improper control by the actual controller
Brief description of important risk matters

The research and development of innovative preparations will take a long period from the key process technology research, preclinical research, clinical research to NMPA approval, with large investment and many unpredictable factors: (1) There is some uncertainty whether the consistency evaluation of generic drugs of products under development can pass, which may lead to the inability to obtain NMPA approval; (2) If the R&D of the subsequent projects cannot be accelerated, it is easy to miss the best time to market, which may affect the future economic benefits; (3) If the R&D products finally face failure, it will have a significant impact on the company's performance, which will affect the sustainable development of the company.

The company is a technology intensive enterprise, and the experience and R&D ability of R&D technicians play an important role in the realization of R&D. With the increasingly fierce competition in the industry, the competition for core technical talents has become increasingly fierce. For this reason, the company has introduced a series of incentive mechanisms, and the company's core technicians directly or indirectly hold the company's shares, but the loss of core technicians may still occur, which will have a negative impact on the company's development.

The company's core technology is an important part of the company's core competitiveness. If the company's R&D achievements are leaked or infringed, it will have a negative impact on the company's development. For this reason, the company has established a comprehensive technology confidentiality system, strengthened the protection of core technology and intellectual property management, and signed a technology confidentiality agreement with all R&D personnel, but it still cannot eliminate the risk of core technology disclosure.

As of December 31, 2019, the actual controllers of the Company and their persons acting in concert Chen Yunhua, Chen Youjun, Wu Jian, Pan Xiaoling, Liu Zhiyou, Chen Chuangeng, Jiang Chaojun and Dusheng Investment held a total of 43.3690 million shares of the Company, accounting for 52.70% of the Company's shares. Among them: Chen Yun, Chairman of Huawei, Wu Jian as Director and Secretary of the Board, Jiang Chaojun as Director and General Manager, Chen Jun, Liu Zhiyou and Chen Chuangeng
Amount incurred in the previous year

chinese_cell_value_list: 4、存货余额较高导致存货跌价损失的风险
重大风险事项简要描述
公司出口销售业务占总营业收入40%以上，由此可见出口对公司经营业绩的影响很大。公司出口采用美元作为结算货币，在很大程度上受美元汇率波动的影响。若美元兑人民币汇率大幅下降，将会对公司业绩产生重大不利影响。
公司持续以新技术、新产品、新工艺研发为工作导向，提高产品的技术水平及其综合竞争能力，保持技术领先的地位。若公司的研发技术偏离市场需求，无法取得突破或未能及时更新关键技术，公司将可能面临竞争力被削弱的风险。
公司所处的行业总体壁垒不高，近年从事相关可替代产品的企业数量也不断增加，市场竞争十分激烈。公司需要不断开拓新的客户以保持较好的收入增长，在保护自身知识产权的同时，依靠不断开发新技术维持在市场竞争中的优势。
公司存货中的原材料主要为各类型的钢材、铝材、电机及相关零部件，库存商品主要为可用于销售的绞盘、电动踏板及辅件。报告期内，公司主要实行“以销定产、适度库存”的订单化生产模式。因存货在资产结构中的比例较高，若发生产品不适销、库存管理不善
english_cell_value_list: 4. Risk of inventory falling price loss caused by high inventory balance
Brief description of major risk events

The company's export sales business accounts for more than 40% of the total operating revenue, which shows that exports have a great impact on the company's operating performance. The Company's exports are settled in USD, which is largely affected by the fluctuation of USD exchange rate. If the exchange rate between the US dollar and the RMB drops significantly, it will have a significant adverse impact on the company's performance.

The company continues to take the research and development of new technologies, new products and new processes as the work orientation, improve the technical level of products and their comprehensive competitiveness, and maintain the leading position in technology. If the company's R&D technology deviates from the market demand, fails to make breakthroughs or fails to update key technologies in time, the company may face the risk of weakening its competitiveness.

The overall barrier of the industry where the company is located is not high. In recent years, the number of enterprises engaged in relevant alternative products is also increasing, and the market competition is very fierce. The company needs to constantly develop new customers to maintain good revenue growth. While protecting its own intellectual property rights, it relies on continuous development of new technologies to maintain its advantage in market competition.

The raw materials in the company's inventory are mainly various types of steel, aluminum, motors and related parts, and the goods in stock are mainly winches, electric pedals and accessories that can be sold. During the reporting period, the company mainly implemented the order based production mode of "production based on sales and moderate inventory". Due to the high proportion of inventory in the asset structure, if the product is not marketable and the inventory management is not good

chinese_cell_value_list: 地域性发展集中，市场竞争力不平衡
重大风险事项描述及分析
公司自成立以来，一直将市场定位于经济较发达的江苏省，在江苏省的市场占有率较高。近年来已经逐渐开始拓展江西、湖南、湖北、新疆等市场，因公司目前的资金实力和人才配备有限，目前在省外新市场的拓展和维护上还是具有一定的压力。
公司业务的拓展与人才息息相关，不仅需要环保、软件和信息技术等专业的人才，也需要相关人才对化学、物理等学科有较为深入的了解，目前具备相关综合素质的人才并不多，且随着公司规模的不断扩大，如果公司文化、考核和激励机制、约束
english_cell_value_list: Centralized regional development and unbalanced market competitiveness
Description and analysis of major risk events

Since its establishment, the company has always positioned the market in the economically developed Jiangsu Province, with a high market share in Jiangsu Province. In recent years, the Company has gradually started to expand the markets in Jiangxi, Hunan, Hubei, Xinjiang, etc. Due to its limited capital strength and talent allocation, the Company still has some pressure on the expansion and maintenance of new markets outside the province.

The expansion of the company's business is closely related to talents. It not only requires talents in environmental protection, software and information technology, but also requires relevant talents to have a deeper understanding of chemistry, physics and other disciplines. At present, there are not many talents with relevant comprehensive qualities. 协议约定和实际股权交割

说明：2016 年6月13日，公司2016年第二次临时股东大会审议通过了《关于拟对外投资设立有限合伙企业暨关联交易的议案》，同意公司以货币方式出资1,150.00万元与山东吉富创业投资合伙企业(有限合伙)投资设立有限合伙企业。公司分别于2016年7月29日、2017年6月20日完成出资人民币750.00万元、120.00万元，出资占比25.00%。2021年12月，本公司以人民币3,270.80万元收购山东吉富持有的海能吉富74%的认缴出资额2,590.00万元，本公司全资子公司山东海能科学仪器有限公司以人民币44.20万元收购山东吉富持有的海能吉富1%的认缴出资额35.00万元。本次对外投资完成后，公司与子公司直接持有海能吉富100.00%的出资份额。2021年12月27日，股权收购工商变更完成。

洁净无噪音。对空气有洗涤、过滤作用。具有加湿降温功效。洁净、等焓加湿，不产生“白粉”现象。
湿膜加湿器利用水的蒸发性，将水通过水泵和分配器不断送到湿膜上部，水均匀地淋到湿膜的顶部，淋水器确保水均匀分配到湿膜材料上，水沿湿膜材料向下渗透，淋湿湿膜内部的所有层面，同时被湿膜材料吸收，形成均匀的水膜．当干燥空气通过湿膜时，空气与大面积的湿膜充分接触，空气中的显热使水汽化，使湿度增加而达到加湿目的。
english_cell_value_list: It is applicable to communication room, switching room, network room, server room, computer room, office, archive room, SMT workshop, LCD factory, PCB factory, ICM pilot factory, packaging factory, semiconductor component factory and other electronic precision workshops. Effectively purify air, increase air humidity, eliminate static electricity and dust, and reduce failure rate.
Clean and noiseless. It can wash and filter the air. It has the effect of humidifying and cooling. Clean and isoenthalpy humidification without "white powder".

The wet film humidifier makes use of the evaporation of water to continuously send water to the upper part of the wet film through the water pump and distributor, and the water is evenly sprayed to the top of the wet film. The water shower ensures that the water is evenly distributed to the wet film material, and the water penetrates downward along the wet film material. All layers inside the wet film are simultaneously absorbed by the wet film material to form a uniform water film. When dry air passes through the wet film, the air is fully contacted with a large area of wet film, Sensible heat in the air vaporizes water and increases humidity to achieve humidification.

chinese_cell_value_list: 重大风险事项简要描述
2011年11月，公司取得经山东省科技厅等部门认定的高新技术企业资质，2020年12月公司已通过高新技术企业复审，并取得《高新技术企业证书》，公司享受减按15%的税率征收企业所得税优惠政策，有效期三年。同时，公司销售自行开发的软件产品，享受按13%的税率征收增值税后，对其实际税负超过3%的部分，实行即征即退的政策优惠。如果公司无法获得上述税收优惠，将会对公司的经营状况产生不利影响。
近年来，公司行业内并购重组、新增对外投资参控股项目较多，且逐步布局进入行业其他细分领域。公司规模扩大、产品种类丰富的同时，资本开支和相关费用也不断增加。如果并购公司盈利能力、其他细分领域的未来产出不能达到公司预期，
english_cell_value_list: Brief description of major risk events

In November 2011, the Company obtained the qualification of high-tech enterprise recognized by Shandong Provincial Department of Science and Technology and other departments. In December 2020, the Company passed the review of high-tech enterprise and obtained the Certificate of High tech Enterprise. The Company enjoys the preferential policy of enterprise income tax at a reduced rate of 15%, which is valid for three years. At the same time, the company sells self-developed software products and enjoys the preferential policy of immediate collection and refund for the part of its actual tax burden exceeding 3% after the value-added tax is levied at the rate of 13%. If the Company is unable to obtain the above tax preferences, it will have a negative impact on the Company's operating conditions.

In recent years, the company has made a lot of mergers and acquisitions in the industry, newly added overseas investment and shareholding projects, and gradually entered other sub sectors of the industry. With the expansion of the company and the variety of products, the capital expenditure and related expenses are also increasing.
